text: You awaken aboard a ship drifting in deep space with no memory and a note in your pocket that reads: Don't trust the captain.
Once the kingdom's most feared warlock, you return after a century of exile to protect the people who once banished you.
Every clue leads you closer to the killer—until you realize they’ve been altering your memory to erase themselves.
Ten years after breaking up, you receive a letter from your first love, inviting you to rewrite your ending.
You’re the only survivor of a failed expedition to an uncharted island that isn’t on any map—and the island wants you to stay.
